sentences:
Arctic Monkeys are a four - piece indie rock band from Sheffield , England .
Since signing for Domino Records in 2005 , the band have gained popularity in many parts of the world , and have gradually progressed to playing larger venues .
Following the release of " I Bet You Look Good on the Dancefloor " in October 2005 , the band had a near - continuous touring schedule that culminated with performances at the Reading and Leeds Festivals .
Following the release of their album , Favourite Worst Nightmare , on 23 April 2007 , the band began a series of tours that included a headline appearance at the Glastonbury Festival as well as hosting their own " mini - festival " at Lancashire County Cricket Ground .
